verbose_text: EMT involves four pivotal stems : (1) loss of epithelial adhesion markers, such as the E-cadherin adhesion complex, (2) de novo expression of alpha-smooth muscle cell actin (SMA) and actin re-organization, (3) matrix metalloproteinases induced basement membrane disruption, and (4) increased cell migration and invasion into the nearby interstitium [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: expression of alpha-smooth muscle cell actin
